items.sentence: Tom has really changed a lot since last year.
Tom has said some very good things about you.
Tom has something very important to tell you.
Tom has taken on additional responsibilities.
Tom doesn\'t know what plan Mary will choose.
Tom doesn\'t like being treated like a child.
Tom doesn\'t mind what people say about Mary.
Tom and I have taken a lot of trips together.
Tom and Mary decided to go see a scary movie.
With the exception of Tom, everyone attended.
Without your assistance, I would have failed.
I assume Tom and Mary weren\'t at your party.
I assume Tom doesn\'t have very many friends.
You can\'t kill someone that\'s already dead.
Tom was always different from the other kids.
Tom was at the right place at the right time.
Tom was bitten by a dog when he was thirteen.
Tom was carried off the field on a stretcher.
Tom was determined to make the football team.
Tom was extremely popular with all the girls.
